long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Rail is your ultimate real-time tracker for NFTs and crypto, bringing all your essential Web3 data into one sleek, customizable ticker-tape display on your browser.

Whether you're keeping tabs on the floor price of your favorite NFT collection, monitoring the latest crypto price swings, or checking gas prices, The Rail ensures you stay informed without disrupting your workflow.

Key Features:

- Real-time tracking: Monitor NFT floor prices, sales, and volumes across multiple chains, including Ethereum, Solana, Matic, Bitcoin Ordinals, and soon ApeChain.

- Customizable display: Easily configure The Rail to show only the NFT collections and cryptocurrencies you care about most. Swap between light and dark modes, and toggle between volume, sales, or floor price displays.

- No logins required: The Rail v.1 is open to all, with no need for logins, wallet connections, or signatures - just install and go.

- Unique rewards: Receive a one-time code to unlock bonus quests on albarra.world and earn Albarra rewards.

How to get started:

1. Download The Rail from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Install and pin The Rail icon in your browser toolbar, then click to get started.
3. Customize your Rail by selecting NFT collections and cryptocurrencies you want to monitor. Seamlessly switch between different data views and modes to suit your workflow.

Why Download The Rail? In Web3, timing is everything. The Rail simplifies your research by delivering real-time updates on the metrics that matter most, helping you make smarter, faster decisions as you navigate the ever-changing world of NFTs and crypto.
